name: Pathematical

Summary

Pathematical is a very simple game aiming to train mental arithmetic skills while having fun.

The game is available for free, but you can choose to pay for it.

What is it about ?

The game is played using the mouse. You will have to create a path in a hexagonal tilemap, until you reach the end of it. To extend the path, you have to click on a tile displaying the correct result of an arithmetical operation displayed on screen.

Credits

The game music was created by rhodesmas @ FreeSound.org, and the game itself was put together by Supercherie's sole developer using the Godot game engine.
